biotools.summary:
A 3D Extension of GRASS GIS r.sun for Estimating Solar Radiation in Urban Environments.

Solar3D is a software application designed to interactively calculate solar irradiation and sky view factor at points on 3D surfaces. It is essentially a 3D extension of the GRASS GIS r.sun solar radiation model.

bioschemas.name: Solar3D
